explanation: [0-0] A woman is standing in front of a blue and pink background, wearing a yellow frog hat and a pink wig. She has gold eyebrows and gold circles painted on her face and is wearing a pink top as she faces the camera. The bottom of the screen has a light black subtitle: "ONE MORE SPANISH".
[0-2] The woman covers her face with both hands and sneezes. A mass of blue slime comes out of her nose. She takes it with her left hand and puts it on the yellow wooden floor.

The man takes them and puts them on top of the blue slime on the floor.
